author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Toilet removal tips…I turn the water off and use LiquiLock in the bowl. After 5 minutes I remove the bowl with the Pick-Up-Stix without dripping water onto the floor. The final step is to cap the closet flange to stop sewer gas from entering the bathroom 👍🏽🔥#toilet #toiletrenovation #bathroominspiration #getitdone
title: Toilet Removal Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
